example: Education helps people develop skills and understand the world.
Knowledge is power.
I learn something new every day.
She goes to school five days a week.
He plans to study engineering at college.
Many students live in dorms while attending university.
She works at a research institute.
The teacher explained the topic clearly.
Every student must submit the assignment on time.
The pupil raised his hand to answer the question.
They will graduate next spring.
The headmistress welcomed new students at the assembly.
I need to study for my history test.
My mother teaches English at a local school.
We attend a lecture on physics every Monday.
He forgot to do his homework last night.
She worked hard to pass the exam.
Today’s math lesson was very interesting.
The professor gave a lecture on climate change.
Biology is my favorite subject.
The school term ends in June.
The new curriculum includes more practical activities.
The academic year starts in September.
The teacher wrote the formula on the board with chalk.
She borrowed a book from the library.
Don’t forget to bring your notebook to class.
He signed his name with a blue pen.
This textbook is required for the course.
Please use a pencil for the sketch.
I looked up the word in my dictionary.
